name: mytube
description: Multiple platform video downloader and player application

scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && node scripts/waitForBackend.cjs && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && node scripts/waitForBackend.cjs && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.complexity:baseline:update: npm run complexity:lizard && node scripts/complexity/lizard-baseline.mjs update /tmp/codacy-lizard.sarif .codacy/lizard-baseline.json
scripts.complexity:check-new: npm run complexity:lizard && node scripts/complexity/lizard-baseline.mjs check /tmp/codacy-lizard.sarif .codacy/lizard-baseline.json
